title.narrative: F.a: Strengthening the negotiation power of the airport workers

description.narrative: The project objective is to strengthen the cooperation of the trade unions in Jakarta airport, their position representing all workers in the airport, and collective bargaining. ##The airport of Jakarta is an important air traffic hub. During the last deca de, airlines have sought economic growth and risk minimization through sub-contracting of their operations, such as baggage logistics, cleaning and catering. As a consequence, out-sourcing of manpower has become much more common than it used to be, which i n turn has weakened the position, working conditions, wages and job security of workers. Negotiating working conditions is difficult for the workers, because the employer is not anymore the company they work at, but a man-power agency, that keeps changing frequently. Work contracts are short and illegal dismissals are common. The project helps workers' organizations in the airport to establish a federation that gathers different groups of employees under the same umbrella and thus strengthens the negotiatin g power and joint agenda of the workers. Particular attention is paid to the interest representation of out-sourced workers. ##The beneficiaries are the workers in the Jakarta airport, particularly the out-sourced workers. ##The project is implemented by the International Transport Workers' Federation ITF.
